page.title: 09WHAT PEOPLE DO FOR INTEREST.
page.content: Most entertainment in Burley Village takes place in the Club or Village Hall.The club is used for Bingo, discos and private parties.Children's entertainment is provided by the Youth club which is privately run.They also have discos at the village hall.The Youth Club runs a drama group.The Village Hall also runs an over 70s club where the elderly people can meet socially.On Wednesdays the Cubs meet for games and the Scouts meet at the same hut on Fridays.The Flower Club and the Gardening Club meet at the Village Hall unless they are going on outings to gardens like Exbury.The nearest cinema is at Bournemouth or Southampton.For ice skating or roller skating we have to go to Bournemouth or Ringwood. By Stephen Bartlett.
